SELECT c.*, s.name as name, sd.`status` AS sd_status, sd.confirm_status AS sd_confirm_status FROM t_planning_category_item c join t_planning_season s on(s.id=c.planning_season_id ) LEFT JOIN t_style sd ON ( sd.planning_category_item_id = c.id AND sd.del_flag = '0' ) WHERE c.del_flag = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
select DISTINCT designer_id as user_id, designer as name from t_planning_category_item s where company_code = #{companyCode} AND del_flag = '0' and designer_id !='' and designer_id is not null

select ${ew.sqlSelect} from t_planning_category_item ci where ci.del_flag ='0' and ci.prod_category is not null and ci.prod_category <> '' and ci.band_code is not null and ci.band_code <> ''
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT ci.id, ci.design_no, ci.his_design_no, ci.price, ci.seasonal, ci.style_pic, ci.continuation_point, ci.designer, ci.designer_id, ci.band_name, ci.band_code, ci.prod_category1st, ci.prod_category1st_name, ci.prod_category, ci.prod_category_name, ci.prod_category2nd_name, ci.prod_category2nd, ci.prod_category3rd, ci.prod_category3rd_name, ci.planning_channel_id, ci.planning_season_id, ci.channel, ci.channel_name, sd.style_no FROM t_planning_category_item ci LEFT JOIN t_style sd ON ( sd.planning_category_item_id = ci.id ) WHERE ci.del_flag = '0' AND ci.del_flag = '0' and ci.prod_category is not null and ci.prod_category <> '' and ci.band_code is not null and ci.band_code <> ''
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
select distinct concat(prod_category1st, ',', prod_category) from t_planning_category_item ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
select style_pic from t_planning_category_item where id = #{id} limit 1
